response:
Young woman with multifocal CNS involvement (optic nerve and brainstem) evolving over days strongly suggests inflammatory demyelination; alternatives include antibody-mediated demyelination and less likely vascular or granulomatous causes.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis", "MOG antibody\u2013associated disease", "Aquaporin-4 neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder", "Ischaemic pontine stroke", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Primary CNS vasculitis", "Brainstem glioma"]
